feed.title: managebot Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for managebot: v1.0.0
entry.content:
The first ever version of managebot. Features are currently limited but still working!

Features

  • Executing Docker Commands (/docker execute) (currently only Start, Stop & Restarting docker containers.)
  • Listing all docker containers and sorts them into Online & Offline. (/list)

View README.md for installation and configuration instructions!

entry.title: New release for managebot: v1.0.1
entry.content:
What's New? (v1.0.1)

  • Docker Image Management + Image Pruning (/docker images | /docker prune) NOTE: The "all" option when using /docker prune is referring to using -all/-a in the command. using it will remove all unused images, not just dangling ones.
  • added Pause/Unpause to /docker execute

Please View README.md for installation and configuration instructions!

entry.title: New release for managebot: v1.0.2
entry.content:
What's New? (v1.0.2)

  • Added Auto Update when restarting/starting. Check here to see how to enable it!
  • Added delete to /docker execute

Please View README.md for installation and configuration instructions!

entry.title: New release for managebot: v1.0.3
entry.content:
Added Docker Compose.

Big thanks to MiraiSubject for putting it together!
